title: Android App Debloater
description: A Windows application (.exe) used for uninstalling or debloating unwanted Android applications directly from a Windows operating system.

title: Heart Disease Prediction System
description: A Machine Learning model that uses supervised algorithms to predict whether a patient has heart disease based on clinical parameters. The UI is a website built with Django.

title: Live Wallpaper Android App
description: An Android app that sets dynamic and static wallpapers from user-selected images. It features a time interval setting for automatically changing wallpapers.

title: Video Wallpaper Android App
description: An Android app for setting videos as dynamic wallpapers. It includes features to add or remove videos and set a time interval for automatic video changes.

title: YouTube Comments Extractor
description: A tool to extract and analyze YouTube comments using the YouTube API and Python. It ethically mines comment data and exports it to JSON and Excel formats.

title: YouTube Video Downloader
description: An Android app for downloading YouTube videos, utilizing the yt-dlp Python library integrated via the Chaquopy interpreter.

title: Google Form Data Extractor
description: An automation script that captures Google Form submissions, stores the data in a Google Sheet, and makes it available to be used in web pages built with JS or React.

title: Loan Approval Prediction Model
description: A Machine Learning model that predicts whether a loan application should be approved or denied based on provided financial data.

title: Customer Churn Prediction Model
description: A Machine Learning model that predicts customer churn based on parameters like service usage, reported issues, and other behavioral data.

title: Body Fitness & Diet App
description: A health and fitness app that calculates BMI, BMR, and Body Fat Percentage to help users make informed dietary decisions.
